mapper.select: select image_url as slideshowPath, goods_id as goodsId from t_sys_slide where slide_status = 1 and is_delete = 0 and now() between start_time and end_time order by sort asc
select dic_value from t_dictionary where dic_type = 'hotGoodsShowNumber' and is_delete = 0

select t1.goods_id as goodsId, t2.goods_name as goodsName, t2.goods_image as goodsImagePath, t2.selling_price as goodsPrice from t_hot_goods t1, t_goods_info t2 where t1.goods_id = t2.id order by t1.sort asc limit #{showNumber}
